meanings.definition: A person or thing that throws or hurls fireballs.
meanings.sent1: The fireballing in the game was a powerful wizard.
meanings.sent2: The fireballing caused chaos in the battlefield.
meanings.sent3: The fireballing contest at the magic school was intense.
meanings.sent4: Her fireballing skills were like a blazing comet streaking through the sky.
meanings.sent5: The fireballing demonstration left everyone in awe.

meanings.definition: The act of throwing or hurling fireballs.
meanings.sent1: The fireballing during the battle was fierce.
meanings.sent3: The fireballing practice session lit up the night sky.
meanings.sent4: The fireballing display was like a fiery dance.

meanings.definition: The state of being skilled at throwing or hurling fireballs.
meanings.sent1: Her fireballing was unmatched in the realm.
meanings.sent2: The fireballing competition showcased incredible talent.
meanings.sent3: The fireballing championship was full of surprises.
meanings.sent4: His fireballing mastery was like a legend come to life.
meanings.sent5: The fireballing expertise was truly remarkable.
